16  struct Single

18  Single()
19  : texture(NULL)

21 
22  void Init( Texture* pTexture, float x, float y, float w, float h )
23  {
24  texture = pTexture;
25  float const texw = texture->width;
26  float const texh = texture->height;
27  uv[0] = x / texw;
28  uv[1] = y / texh;
29  uv[2] = ( x + w ) / texw;
30  uv[3] = ( y + h ) / texh;
31  iWidth = w;
32  iHeight = h;
33  }
34 
35  void Draw( Gwen::Renderer::Base* render, Gwen::Rect r, const Gwen::Color & col = Gwen::Colors::White )
36  {
37  if ( !texture )
38  return;
39 
40  render->SetDrawColor( col );
41  render->DrawTexturedRect( texture, r, uv[0], uv[1], uv[2], uv[3] );
42  }
43 
44  void DrawCenter( Gwen::Renderer::Base* render, Gwen::Rect r, const Gwen::Color & col = Gwen::Colors::White )
45  {
46  if ( !texture )
47  return;
48 
49  r.x += ( r.w - iWidth )/2;
50  r.y += ( r.h - iHeight )/2;
51  r.w = iWidth;
52  r.h = iHeight;
53  Draw( render, r, col );
54  }

58  float uv[4];
59  int iWidth;

79  void Init( Texture* pTexture, float x, float y, float w, float h, Margin in_margin, float DrawMarginScale = 1.0f )
80  {
81  texture = pTexture;
82  margin = in_margin;
83  SetRect( 0, x, y, margin.left, margin.top );
84  SetRect( 1, x + margin.left, y, w - margin.left - margin.right, margin.top );
85  SetRect( 2, ( x + w ) - margin.right, y, margin.right, margin.top );
86  SetRect( 3, x, y + margin.top, margin.left, h - margin.top - margin.bottom );
87  SetRect( 4, x + margin.left, y + margin.top, w - margin.left - margin.right, h - margin.top - margin.bottom );
88  SetRect( 5, ( x + w ) - margin.right, y + margin.top, margin.right, h - margin.top - margin.bottom );
89  SetRect( 6, x, ( y + h ) - margin.bottom, margin.left, margin.bottom );
90  SetRect( 7, x + margin.left, ( y + h ) - margin.bottom, w - margin.left - margin.right, margin.bottom );
91  SetRect( 8, ( x + w ) - margin.right, ( y + h ) - margin.bottom, margin.right, margin.bottom );
92  margin.left *= DrawMarginScale;
93  margin.right *= DrawMarginScale;
94  margin.top *= DrawMarginScale;
95  margin.bottom *= DrawMarginScale;
96  width = w - x;
97  height = h - y;
98  }
99 
100  void SetRect( int iNum, float x, float y, float w, float h )
101  {
102  float const texw = texture->width;
103  float const texh = texture->height;
104  rects[iNum].uv[0] = x / texw;
105  rects[iNum].uv[1] = y / texh;
106  rects[iNum].uv[2] = ( x + w ) / texw;
107  rects[iNum].uv[3] = ( y + h ) / texh;
108  }
109 
110  //
117  //
118  void Draw( Gwen::Renderer::Base* render, Gwen::Rect r,
119  const Gwen::Color & col = Gwen::Colors::White, unsigned int draw = ~0 )
120  {
121  if (!texture)
122  return;
123 
124  render->SetDrawColor( col );
125 
126  if (r.w < width && r.h < height)
127  {
128  render->DrawTexturedRect(texture,
129  r,
130  rects[0].uv[0], rects[0].uv[1], rects[8].uv[2], rects[8].uv[3]);
131  return;
132  }
133 
134  if (draw & (1<<0)) { DrawRect( render, 0, r.x, r.y, margin.left, margin.top ); }
135 
136  if (draw & (1<<1)) { DrawRect( render, 1, r.x + margin.left, r.y, r.w - margin.left - margin.right, margin.top ); }
137 
138  if (draw & (1<<2)) { DrawRect( render, 2, ( r.x + r.w ) - margin.right, r.y, margin.right, margin.top ); }
139 
140  if (draw & (1<<3)) { DrawRect( render, 3, r.x, r.y + margin.top, margin.left, r.h - margin.top - margin.bottom ); }
141 
142  if (draw & (1<<4)) { DrawRect( render, 4, r.x + margin.left, r.y + margin.top, r.w - margin.left - margin.right, r.h - margin.top - margin.bottom ); }
143 
144  if (draw & (1<<5)) { DrawRect( render, 5, ( r.x + r.w ) - margin.right, r.y + margin.top, margin.right, r.h - margin.top - margin.bottom ); }
145 
146  if (draw & (1<<6)) { DrawRect( render, 6, r.x, ( r.y + r.h ) - margin.bottom, margin.left, margin.bottom ); }
147 
148  if (draw & (1<<7)) { DrawRect( render, 7, r.x + margin.left, ( r.y + r.h ) - margin.bottom, r.w - margin.left - margin.right, margin.bottom ); }
149 
150  if (draw & (1<<8)) { DrawRect( render, 8, ( r.x + r.w ) - margin.right, ( r.y + r.h ) - margin.bottom, margin.right, margin.bottom ); }
151  }
